## Other Contributions

::: {.software-section}

::: {.software-entry}
::: {.software-name}
Panpipes
:::
::: {.software-description}
A collection of cgat-core/ruffus pipelines to streamline the analysis of multi-modal single cell data. Supports scRNAseq, CITEseq, scV(D)Jseq, scATACseq, and spatial transcriptomics data with comprehensive workflows for quality control, preprocessing, integration, clustering, and visualization.
:::
::: {.software-links}
[{{< fa globe >}} Documentation](https://panpipes-pipelines.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
[{{< fa brands github >}} GitHub](https://github.com/DendrouLab/panpipes) &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
[{{< fa file-text >}} Paper](https://doi.org/10.1186/s13059-024-03322-7)
:::
